effect.black_white: User faints. Its replacement’s HP and PP are fully restored, and any major status effect is removed.
effect.black_2_white_2: User faints. Its replacement’s HP and PP are fully restored, and any major status effect is removed.

short_effect.black_white: User faints, and its replacement is fully healed.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: User faints, and its replacement is fully healed.

flavor_text.black_white: The user faints. In return, the Pokémon taking its place will have its status and HP fully restored.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user faints. In return, the Pokémon taking its place will have its status and HP fully restored.
